title: POLICE: Mother 'accidentally' shot by 2-year-old son near Churchill Downs
content:
LOUISVILLE, Ky. (WDRB) -- A mother was "accidentally" shot Friday night by her 2-year-old son, police say.
Louisville Metro Police Department says the shooting happened around 5:30 p.m. at a home in the 500 block of Evelyn Avenue, just south of Churchill Downs.
Police spokesperson Alicia Smiley says the mother is conscious and alert at University Hospital with non-life threatening injuries.
Officers are still investigating how the boy got the gun and if anyone else was in the house.
